CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISBLANK(ClosedDate),NOT(ISBLANK(RW_Case_Reopened_Date__c))),TODAY()-DATEVALUE(RW_Case_Reopened_Date__c ), IF(AND(ISBLANK(ClosedDate), ISBLANK(RW_Case_Reopened_Date__c)), TODAY()-DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(ClosedDate)), NOT(ISBLANK(RW_Case_Reopened_Date__c))), DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) - DATEVALUE(RW_Case_Reopened_Date__c), DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)- DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) ))
CustomField.label: AgeingOfComplaints
